timeline.bodyText:
So this is meant to go 2 levels right, not N levels? Or am I missing something?
2 levels is actually fine too!
timeline.author: hisundar

replies.bodyText: It is bounded to nestedFields.length, so it can actually go to N levels. It will return outside of the for loop, unless a cast exception is encountered and it's in the last level.
replies.author: annym

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we also handle else if (fieldDescriptor.isRepeated()) { for indexes on collections?
timeline.author: hisundar

replies.bodyText: I didn't consider collections, let me work on adding it.
replies.author: annym

replies.bodyText: Done, now it supports collections and nested secondary indexes.
replies.author: annym

timeline.message: UFO Secondary Indexes on nested paths

UFO Secondary Indexes on nested paths
